'''Dendro Crystalfly''' is a type of [[Crystalfly]] that can be found in the wild in [[Sumeru]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Crystal Core|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=393 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
